Package com.northeastern.labyrinth.Model.GameState

Interface IPlayerState<T extends IPlayerData<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - private or public type of IPlayerData.
All Known Subinterfaces:
IRefereeState
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractState, PlayerState, RefereeState
public interface IPlayerState<T extends IPlayerData<T>>
Represents the public knowledge and functionality of the game state.

  • Method Details

    • rotateSpare

      IPlayerState<T> rotateSpare(int degree)
      Returns a GameState with the spare tile rotated counterclockwise by a degree
      Parameters:
      degree - the degree to rotate the spare tile. Degrees must be multiple of 90. Negative values implicitly will rotate clockwise.
      Returns:
      a new copy reflecting the updated player state with rotated spare tile.

    • insertSpare

      IPlayerState<T> insertSpare(SlideAction action)
      Returns a GameState with a slided row/col by inserting the spare tile, shifting all players on it. Returned GameState will have given action as its new previousAction If the player is outplaced from the board, reassigns its location to the newly inserted Tile. If the slide undoes the last slide action, throws an error
      Parameters:
      action - the slide action to be performed.
      Returns:
      a new copy reflecting the updated player state

    • canReachGivenLocation

      boolean canReachGivenLocation(Coordinate toSearch)
      Checks if the current active player has a possible path to the provided Tile at given location.
      Parameters:
      toSearch - the location of the tile to check.
      Returns:
      true if the player can reach the tile, false otherwise.

    • validSlideDimension

      boolean validSlideDimension(SlideAction slideAction)
      Checks if the given slide action is reversing the previous move's slide.

    • getBoard

      MazeBoard getBoard()
      Returns the board

    • getCurrentPlayerPosition

      Coordinate getCurrentPlayerPosition()
      Gets active player's current position.

    • getPreviousSlide

      SlideAction getPreviousSlide()
      Gets previous slide action.

    • getSpareTile

      Tile getSpareTile()
      Returns current spare tile.

    • getListOfPlayers

      List<T> getListOfPlayers()
      Returns:
      list of players with their T type information

    • buildState

      IPlayerState<T> buildState(MazeBoard board, Tile spareTile, Queue<T> listOfPlayers, SlideAction previousSlideAction)
      Builds a state of type IPlayerState to preserve the common interface.
